problem.markdown:
>>The 0 state in an M/M/1 queue is connected to: <<
( ) Zero states. (x) One state. ( ) Two states. [explanation] Because the system does not allow for negative values, the 0 state is only connected with the 1 state. This 0 state is special in that it is connected by departure but not arrival. [explanation]
